title: Looking for Silver Top and Support
body: I am the mid laner for the team Technical Knock Out (TKO). We are looking for a top laner and a support. Please only contact me if you are at least silver 5. My in game name is TheGorillaGuy. Please comment before you contact me in game so that I know you wish to try out. I also am not the coach of my team so when you try out you will have to clear with him on wether or not if he thinks you will be good, or good enough, for the team.

replies.body: I'll treeout.

> [{quoted}](name=My ADC Cant Farm,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=5m79L3Fm,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-08T02:28:07.353+0000)
>
> I'll treeout.

Yo you never added me

Im a silver 5 support main willing to try out. My champ pool is thresh nautilus braum morgana and nami.  Age 21 with decent shotcalling skills and a willingness to communicate and learn with a team. Thanks again

Add me in game and I can talk to you later tonight.
Add me so i can replace your adc, or i can support him so he can be better adc.
I am a gold 4 Supp main, what hours would your team be playing?

> [{quoted}](name=DarkFire81,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=5m79L3Fm,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-05-08T20:53:52.770+0000)
>
> I am a gold 4 Supp main, what hours would your team be playing?

As of now we do not play much, but that is because we are lacking at positions so can't. However before we lost top and supp we would usually all be on around 9:00 pm central.

> [{quoted}](name=TheGorillaGuy,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=5m79L3Fm,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-05-08T21:27:59.100+0000)
>
> As of now we do not play much, but that is because we are lacking at positions so can't. However before we lost top and supp we would usually all be on around 9:00 pm central.

9pm central is when i would be available during week till 11pm central. And 9pm central till whenever on weekends. Let me know if you all are still in need of a supp. Have team experience. my team last year got to plat 1.
Silver V willing to try out! I main JG & top! Really active player

Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
Silver 5, willing to try out as top laner. Can also play fill - an extremely active player.
Impostor Top/Sup, many champs
mayorfithugh7, play both sup and top. high win % top.

I am a Silver 4 support main. I roam well and can make good plays bot lane as well as mid lane and do well with dragon control. My champion pool is mainly Leona, Alistar, Braum, Blitz, Thresh, Morg, and Annie. And also working on more. Looking for a team that plays to win and can communicate well not tilt easily after one bad call or a bad catch. Very positive player who loves league and I am quick to adjusting with different team comps. In game GOAT Leader
I would like to tryout. Support main Gold 4
Mistermcfister gold v
interested
I am Bronze I Top. Main Quinn and Darius.  WIlling to try out.
just added you, ign is 500ugtabs. i play support
